title: Just Me and My Dad
description:
Father and son go camping, but who is really taking care of whom?This heart-warming tale of a father-and-son camping trip is filled with Little Critter's mistakes and good intentions. In spite of the difficulties, however, the happy father and son manage to put up their tent, catch fish for dinner, and sleep beneath the stars.
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites of parents and children alike.
author: Mercer Mayer
